abstract: Representative Tammy L. Duckworth of Illinois is expected to announce next week that she will challenge Senator Mark S. Kirk in 2016.

headline.main: Tammy Duckworth Expected to Challenge Senator Mark Kirk in Illinois
headline.print_headline: Congresswoman to Run for Senate in Illinois

snippet: Representative Tammy L. Duckworth of Illinois is expected to announce next week that she will challenge Senator Mark S. Kirk in 2016.
